value.title: StarCraft 2: RELENTLESS AGGRESSION! (ByuN vs Trap)
value.excerpt: Trap versus ByuN in a best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2. After having a look at ByuN's Terran versus Zerg a few days ago, today we have a look at the current state of his Terran versus Protoss. value.title: StarCraft 2: TACTICAL NUKES HIS OWN BASE?! (Cure vs Trap)
value.excerpt: One of the best series of Terran versus Protoss at the top level of StarCraft 2 that I've seen this year. value.title: StarCraft 2: Terran vs Terran Insanity!

value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Scarlett (Zerg) and ByuN (Terran). value.title: StarCraft 2: FEAR THE THUNDER! (Maru vs soO)
value.excerpt: Terran Mech seems to be new gold standard in the Zerg versus Terran match-up in StarCraft 2. In this top-level match between Maru and soO the Terran also decides to go for an army composition based primarily around Thors, Siege Tanks and Battlecruisers. The Zerg player soO takes a different approach
